title: rAma perumai sollat-taramO rAma
sahitya:
rAman perumai shollat-taramO rAma kalyANa rAma 
kOdaNDarAma paTTabhirAma raghuvIra


anupallavi

  nAmaNanda AnandadhAraka nAman ikSvAku kulak-kaDal 
alai Ezhu sOman ati sundaramighu dasharatha nandana raghu


caraNam    kaNDOraik-kETTOrai oru noDi tan vasam kavarndu Alum oyyAran 
kAntiyum urudiyum nItiyum buddhiyum kalandu urukkoNDa dhIran
uNDAna mozhi pEsha urai vENumAip-pOlE uttamam pEshum gambhIran anda
uyarndOngum puruvattai noDi kaNDa edirigaL Odi vandu caraNAgum raghuvIran raNadhIran
				(madhyamakAla)
uyarnda neDum giri koDumuDiyO ena Ongi vaLar tigazh tOLan 
ulagam vAzha abhayam taru kaigaLum Odi vandu muzhangAl varai n Ilum
viyanuru shanku pOnra kaNDattazha kODu viNmatiyinai kannamum Alum
minji avanazhagai sholluvadenrAl vINAna kAriyam AnAlum kELum
